typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id as integer,
		name as string,
		age as integer,
		address as string,
		phone as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> srcoltp
source(output(
		id as integer,
		name as string,
		age as integer,
		address as string,
		phone as integer,
		{_Inserted} as timestamp,
		{_LastUpdated} as timestamp,
		DWHash as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> lkpsrcolap
srcoltp select(mapColumn(
		src_id = id,
		src_name = name,
		src_age = age,
		src_address = address,
		src_phone = phone
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> rename
rename derive(src_dwhash = sha2(256,src_age+src_phone)) ~> createsrchash
createsrchash lookup(ERROR_FUNCTION('') == ERROR_FUNCTION(''),
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'none')~> lkptgtolap
